crm_utils module¶

Utility functions etc. based on the CRM data model and mapped to LoRa.

crm_utils.add_product_to_agreement(product_uuid, agreement_uuid)[source]¶

Add product to agreement.

crm_utils.create_agreement(name, agreement_type, no_of_products, invoice_address, start_date, end_date, location, customer_relation_uuid, product_uuids)[source]¶

Create an Indsats from this info and return UUID.

crm_utils.create_customer(id_number, key, name, master_id, phone='', email='', mobile='', fax='', note='')[source]¶

Create customer from data extracted from KMD EE.

crm_utils.create_customer_relation(customer_number, customer_relation_name, customer_type, address_uuid)[source]¶

Create an Interessefællesskab from this info and return UUID.

crm_utils.create_customer_role(customer_uuid, customer_relation_uuid, role)[source]¶

Create an OrgFunktion from this info and return UUID.

crm_utils.create_product(name, identification, installation_type, meter_number, meter_type, start_date, end_date, product_address)[source]¶

Create a Klasse from this info and return UUID.

crm_utils.get_cpr_data(id)[source]¶

Dummy implementation for dry runs.

crm_utils.lookup_address_from_sp_data(sp_dict, id_number)[source]¶

Lookup DAWA address from data returned by SP.

crm_utils.lookup_agreement_from_product(product_uuid)[source]¶

Lookup agreement from the UUID of a product.

crm_utils.lookup_agreements(customer_relation)[source]¶

Lookup agreement(s) for customer relation, by UUID.

crm_utils.lookup_customer(id_number)[source]¶

Look up customer by ID number.

crm_utils.lookup_customer_from_cpr(id_number)[source]¶

Look up customer (user) from CPR number.

crm_utils.lookup_customer_from_cvr(id_number)[source]¶

Look up customer from the CVR number of its Virksomhed.

crm_utils.lookup_customer_relation(customer_number)[source]¶

Look up customer relations belonging to customer number.

crm_utils.lookup_customer_role(customer_relation, role)[source]¶

Look up customer role from customer and role specification.

crm_utils.lookup_customer_roles(customer_relation)[source]¶

Find all customer roles for a given customer relation.

crm_utils.lookup_product(productid)[source]¶

Look up product (installation and meter) from ID.

crm_utils.lookup_products(agreement_uuid)[source]¶

Get products for this agreement.

crm_utils.update_agreement(fields, new_values)[source]¶

Update agreement based on the changed fields.

crm_utils.update_customer(fields, new_values)[source]¶

Update customer with new information.

crm_utils.update_customer_relation(fields, new_values)[source]¶

Update customer relation with the changed values.

crm_utils.update_product(uuid, fields, new_values)[source]¶

Update product with new information.
